doc.title: Ask Again Later
doc.plot: Based on the Joyce Carol Oates short story, 'Revenge of the Foot,' the short film "Ask Again Later" explores a young woman emotionally trapped in a romantic relationship. Unable to communicate her unhappiness and confusion, Cara acts out destructively in an effort to free herself from her situation. Described by the renowned author Oates as 'witty, stylish and deftly done,' the film features an outstanding debut performance by actress Isabelle Albuqurque.
